channel.title: Last-xile.com | The Return of The Pk Era
channel.description:
[center]Hello and welcome to the Project thread of Last-Xile. I do realize that i do make a lot of servers/projects and then quit. Only reason i do quit is because i get bored. Anyways Lets get on with the thread.
Last-Xile is a pk server loading 602+ Data.
[B][I]Information About the Server[/I][/B]
Last-Xile is an Pk Server with economy,
I have already started this project a few days ago so somethings are completed.
There will be a nice spawn tab interface which allows you to obtain some free gear.
But thats as free as items will get. Everything else will either be in shops or a Npc drop.
PK points will obviously be there.
[B][I]Beta Link[/I][/B]
[url=http://www.last-xile.com]Website[/url]
[url=http://last-xile.com/index.php/pages/webclient]Play Now[/url]
[url=http://last-xile.com/index.php/pages/download]Download Client[/url]
[B][I]Beta Players[/I][/B]
For all the beta players they will receive a rare item on the official release date for server
They will be the only one's in the game to have them which makes it the rarest item. [/center]
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0z3Euz3.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ooqSCaY.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y5ANDof.png[/img]
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/4148/eoqi.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/X14toVH.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7qW2GJU.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KTKRJO1.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lu1w3Um.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kgqCmme.png[/img]
[img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/9088/j7ob.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PhHbaCZ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yn4dkeH.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kJn4esv.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kmonSYq.png[/img] [/center]
[center][size=24pt]LOG[/size][/center] [center]✓ 602 Characters(CachePacked) ✓ 634 Items(CachePacked) ✓ 602 Anims and Gfx(CachePacked) ✓ 508/525 Maps Objects ✓ Removed Wilderness Ditch ✓ Added Cursors Client/Server Sided. ✓ ToolTips added for most things. ✓ 508/525 Gameframe ✓ Perfectly Aligned orbs ✓ New Bank Tab ✓ Spawn Set Interface ✓ Better Player Lighting ✓ Better Object Lighting ✓ Better LoginScreen/LoginBox(Credits to wolf for images) ✓ Changed Login area text color to red ✓ Added npc that handles spawn set interface ✓ Purchased Entity Combat for 20$(Not really sure if i got ripped off) ✓ Flawless Switching(Eliminate) ✓ Bh Worlds for wilderness ✓ Added Ep/Level Diffrence/ target all into [/center]

item.title: Last-xile.com | The Return of The Pk Era
item.dc:creator: @DdsSpecz DdsSpecz
item.description:
@DdsSpecz wrote:

CoderOops:

Cache is huge. gave up at halfway…

Not sure why you are saying that because cache is only 55mb? Your netmust be bad.

Read full topic
